data.title: Une Vie (1958)
data.meta_description: An idealistic daughter from a noble family in Normandy marries a cynical skirt chaser. This atmospheric adaptation of a novel by Guy de Maupassant chronicles the sad life of a woman trapped in a loveless marriage.
data.text:
Alexandre Astruc / IT, FR, 1958 / 83 min.

An idealistic daughter from a noble family in Normandy marries a cynical skirt chaser. This atmospheric adaptation of a novel by Guy de Maupassant chronicles the sad life of a woman trapped in a loveless marriage.

Also in EYE: Une vie by Stéphane Brizé (2016, 119')
